subject: PortableRalph Phase 3 Blocker: Windows Environment Required

content.issue: Phase 3 requires Windows environment testing but we are on Linux server (dev3)
options: Set up Windows VM on server (resource intensive)
Use remote Windows node if available
Manual testing by Aaron on his Windows machine
Skip/defer Windows testing for initial release
content.recommendation: Need strategic decision on Windows testing approach before populating Phase 3 tasks
content.phase_status: Phase 2 complete, Phase 3 blocked pending decision
